text:
Is anyone using the new <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/dnd-area-in-custom-emailtemplate/idi-p/488524|DND email beta>? Wondering if anyone's run into these issues:
1. I'm getting the error "The dnd_module tag is using invalid dnd email module path...", so I'm not able to publish the template and test it out. (attached image #1)
2. Does anyone know if there's a way to remove the `hs_padded` class from the output? It's adding unwanted padding to the modules. (attached image #2)
